name: 血塗られた石晶
description: 恐怖が深まる真夜中、「血塗られた石晶」の教団ほど恐ろしい者たちは存在しない。彼らを目にした者たちの叫びが辺りに響き渡り、通りは赤く染まる。彼らの主は飢えている。その飢えは、何があろうと満たされなくてはならない。

skins.name: 鮮血の魔王ブラッドミア

wikiSkinData.lore: Former leader of a Bloodstone cult, Vladimir took part in a ritual that sacrificed his humanity—along with the blood of several victims—to transform the once foppish noble into a terror of the night. To satiate his sanguine cravings, he stalks the urban labyrinth in search of hapless prey.

skins.name: 闇のクリスタル ライズ
血塗られた石晶タリック

wikiSkinData.lore: Considered to be the most handsome and cunning acolyte of his Bloodstone cult, Taric seized power after the former leader took to the hunt. Now fully in control of his Bloodstone artifact, he uses his powers to maintain his youth and beauty at all costs—even if it means getting his hands a little bloody.

skins.name: 血塗られた怒りレネクトン

wikiSkinData.lore: This blood-crazed killing machine scours the battlefield to sate the Bloodstone. The more he slays, the more he fuels his powers. This in turn feeds his frenzy, creating a never ending cycle of spilt viscera and gore.

skins.name: 血塗られた騎士ヘカリム

wikiSkinData.lore: A zealous sycophant to his order, Hecarim unquestioningly serves the will of the Bloodstone. While less subtle than his masters would like, he is nonetheless effective in his purpose of executing enemies in a grisly fashion.

skins.name: 血塗られた石晶リサンドラ

wikiSkinData.lore: Once a powerful sorceress who sought absolute control over her followers, Lissandra transformed into something altogether different when she finally found the hallowed Bloodstone. The magic she drew from it drove her to slay those who once tended to her every whim. To this day she wanders in search of more mortals to sacrifice to her newfound source of power.
